quote: There are three ways to ultimate success: The first way is to be kind. The second way is to be kind. The third way is to be kind.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: There are times when explanations, no matter how reasonable, just don't seem to help.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Discovering the truth about ourselves is a lifetime's work, but it's worth the effort.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The world needs a sense of worth, and it will achieve it only by its people feeling that they are worthwhile.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Forgiveness is a strange thing. It can sometimes be easier to forgive our enemies than our friends. It can be hardest of all to forgive people we love. Like all of life's important coping skills, the ability to forgive and the capacity to let go of resentments most likely take root very early in our lives.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I don't think anyone can grow unless he's loved exactly as he is now, appreciated for what he is rather than what he will be
author: Fred Rogers

quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I feel so strongly that deep and simple is far more essential than shallow and complex.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The only thing evil can't stand is forgiveness.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Taking care is one way to show your love. Another way is letting people take good care of you when you need it.
author: Fred Rogers
